LanguageData.TreeCutting_Disapproved.label: 못마땅함
LanguageData.TreeCutting_Disapproved.description: To cut down a tree is a distasteful thing to do.
LanguageData.TreeCutting_Horrible.label: 끔찍함
LanguageData.TreeCutting_Horrible.description: To cut down a tree is a horrible act.
LanguageData.TreeCutting_Prohibited.label: 금기
LanguageData.TreeCutting_Prohibited.description: 벌목하여 숲을 훼손하는 것은 매우 혐오스러운 행위이며, 절대 용납될 수 없다.
